a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Change in Global Hunger Index vs. Population growth
The change in global hunger index is measured over the period from 1992 to 2017. The population growth is
measured over the period from 1992 to 2015.
Data source: IFPRI 2017 Global Hunger Index; UN, World Population Prospects (2015)
Note: Downwards sloping line is line of best fit (predicted values from a linear regression)
